meanings.definition: A person or thing that updates.
meanings.sent1: The updaters in the office always keep our files current.
meanings.sent2: The team of updaters worked diligently to ensure the information was accurate.
meanings.sent3: The updaters at the library were like busy bees, buzzing around to refresh the system.
meanings.sent4: She was the updater of our group, constantly bringing new ideas to the table.
meanings.sent5: The updaters were like the gears in a clock, ensuring everything ran smoothly.

meanings.definition: Software or program that updates data or information.
meanings.sent1: I rely on the updaters on my computer to keep everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The updaters automatically download the latest patches to improve security.
meanings.sent3: The updaters on my phone are like little elves, silently working their magic overnight.
meanings.sent4: The software updaters are the unsung heroes of our digital world.
meanings.sent5: The updaters are like digital janitors, sweeping away the old data to make room for the new.

meanings.definition: The act of updating or making something current.
meanings.sent1: Regular updaters of the website ensure it stays relevant to users.
meanings.sent2: The updaters of the news feed keep us informed with the latest headlines.
meanings.sent3: The updaters of the menu at the restaurant are like artists, creating new culinary masterpieces.
meanings.sent4: Her constant updaters of the project plan kept everyone on track.
meanings.sent5: The updaters are like rays of sunshine, brightening up the outdated information.
